title: Promiscuous Idiots Island
description: A billionaire bachelor dates multiple women, gives each of them a rose of continuation, or hurls a rock of rejection. What the women don’t know is the bachelor has a secret: the island is actually a peninsula.
quote: This was supposed to be about trust!
altHero: a handsome man hands a rose to a woman
alt2: a bespectacled woman is hit in the face with a rock
alt3: a hand removes a strip of paper from a map of the island revealing it’s a peninsula
